title: Where it all started
caption: This is the day I comissioned as an Engineer Officer and earned an engineering degree from NC State.  You will notice a trend in my pictures that NC State kind of stuck with me.  This was the first day of my first career.
altText: This is the day I comissioned as an Engineer Officer and earned an engineering degree from NC State.  You will notice a trend in my pictures that NC State kind of stuck with me.  This was the first day of my first career.

title: My first job
caption: This is me in front of my Bradley Fighting Vehicle. I was a Platoon Leader leading 30+ Combat Engineers.  Talk about a lot of responsibility for a first job out of college. I grew up fast.
altText: This is me in front of my Bradley Fighting Vehicle. I was a Platoon Leader leading 30+ Combat Engineers.  Talk about a lot of responsibility for a first job out of college. I grew up fast.

title: Project Engineer
caption: I had a short stint as a Project Engineer after my Combat Engineering Roles where I got to dive into Project Management by mostly helping with administrative tasks for existing projects.
altText: I had a short stint as a Project Engineer after my Combat Engineering Roles where I got to dive into Project Management by mostly helping with administrative tasks for existing projects.

title: South Korea
caption: I was lucky to live in South Korea for 3 years where I served as a Program Manager for Army construction and a Company Commander.
altText: I was lucky to live in South Korea for 3 years where I served as a Program Manager for Army construction and a Company Commander.

title: South Korea Again
caption: I told you NC State would follow me through these images.  I got lucky enough to work with a friend from college when I was in Korea!
altText: I told you NC State would follow me through these images.  I got lucky enough to work with a friend from college when I was in Korea!

title: Company Commander
caption: This was me the day we stood up a new organization. I was the Commander of 168+ soldiers and leaders in Korea This is where I really learned about change management having to bring cultures together to accomplish great things quickly.
altText: This was me the day we stood up a new organization.  This is where I really learned about change management having to bring cultures together to accomplish great things quickly.

title: My soldiers
caption: These are pictures of the soldiers I led (I am in the middle). This was the most satisfying role I have ever had because I got to wake up every day for these soliders and not just for me. It was an honor to lead them.
altText: These are pictures of the soldiers I led (I am in the middle). This was the most satisfying role I have ever had because I got to wake up every day for these soliders and not just for me. It was an honor to lead them.

title: Company Command - again
caption: These are pictures of the soldiers I led (I am in the middle). This was the most satisfying role I have ever had because I got to wake up every day for these soliders and not just for me. It was an honor to lead them.

title: Company Command 3
caption: These is the last training event I conducted with my Company, where we recieved the highest ratings you could get from external evaluators!
altText: These is the last training event I conducted with my Company, where we recieved the highest ratings you could get from external evaluators!

title: Saying Farewell
caption: This is my last day as a Company Commander where I had to say farewell to my soldiers.  It was an emotional day for sure.
altText: This is my last day as a Company Commander where I had to say farewell to my soldiers.  It was an emotional day for sure.

title: Next Chapter - The Ohio State University
caption: This is me and my wife who I met while I was in Korea!  We are at a military ball shortly after arriving in Ohio for my next role.
altText: This is me and my wife who I met while I was in Korea!  We are at a military ball shortly after arriving in Ohio for my next role.

title: Family
caption: This is where I am now. I currently work at EY as a Technology Consultant in Product Management where I mainly focus on Product Organiaztional Transformations (Think Marty Cagan Transformed). I dont take many pictures at work these days. I have two children and a wife who are my priority.

title: School!
caption: One of the great things about the Army is their investment in professional development. This is me at the Engineer Captains Career Course where I got to develop my leadership and engineering skills for a year. I was lucky enough to get to mentor two international students!
altText: One of the great things about the Army is their investment in professional development. This is me at the Engineer Captains Career Course where I got to develop my leadership and engineering skills for a year. I was lucky enough to get to mentor two international students!

title: Throw Back!
caption: This was me as a child. No, I dont have blond hair anymore, but the outfits are still the same.

title: Buckeyes
caption: This was me and some of the Cadets where I was assigned as a CEMAT (Coach, Evaluator, Mentor, and Trainer) for 3 years. I am one of the small red dots. I was teaching Leadership and Military Science at The Ohio State University while also studying in the MBA program!
altText: This was me and some of the Cadets where I was assigned as a CEMAT (Coach, Evaluator, Mentor, and Trainer) for 3 years.  I was teaching Leadership and Military Science at The Ohio State University while also studying in the MBA program!
